meanings.definition: An official count or survey of a population, typically recording various details of individuals.
meanings.sent1: The census revealed that the town had grown by 10% in the past year.
meanings.sent2: The government conducts a census every ten years to gather population data.
meanings.sent3: During the census, the mayor accidentally counted the same person twice!
meanings.sent4: The census is like taking a snapshot of the entire town at once.
meanings.sent5: Remember to participate in the census to ensure accurate representation of our community.
